nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: Asteroids and dead sats orbit a black sphere that eats light. The path ahead fractures into eddies.

choices.text: Plot a safe approach around the eddies.
Ping the perimeter. See who answers.

nodes.speaker: navigator_chen
nodes.text: Course plotted to skirt shear zones. It’ll take longer, but we’ll live to complain about it.

nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: Vector locked. If we push through, the Choir will notice.

nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: Response received. Multiple ships… harmonized. They form a cordon and request we turn back.
